verses.verse: I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3588>as<s%> a fellow <S%G4850>elder,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3144>witness<s%> of the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and who will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2844>share<s%> in the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G3195>will<s%> be <S%G601>revealed.<s%>

<S%G4165>Shepherd<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> exercising the <S%G1983>oversight,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> under <S%G317>compulsion,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1596>voluntarily,<s%> <S%G3366>not<s%> for dishonest <S%G147>gain,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1596>willingly;<s%>
<S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> lording it <S%G2634>over<s%> those <S%G2819>entrusted<s%> to <S%G235>you,<s%> but <S%G1096>making<s%> yourselves <S%G5179>examples<s%> to the <S%G4168>flock.<s%>
<S%G2532>When<s%> the chief <S%G750>Shepherd<s%> is <S%G5319>revealed,<s%> you will <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G262>doesn't<s%> fade away.

<S%G3668>Likewise,<s%> <S%G240>you<s%> <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5293>ones,<s%> be subject to the <S%G4245>elder.<s%> <S%G1161>Yes,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of you clothe yourselves <S%G1463>with<s%> <S%G5012>humility,<s%> to subject yourselves to one <S%G5293>another;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2316>"God<s%> <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble.<s%>"

Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2900>mighty<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> due <S%G2540>time;<s%>

Be <S%G3525>sober<s%> and <S%G1127>self-controlled.<s%> Be watchful. <S%G3754><s%> <S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G476>adversary,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> walks <S%G4043>around<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5612>roaring<s%> <S%G3023>lion,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> he may <S%G2666>devour.<s%>

<S%G436>Withstand<s%> <S%G3739>him<s%> <S%G4731>steadfast<s%> in your <S%G4102>faith,<s%> knowing <S%G1492>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G81>brothers<s%> who are <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> are <S%G2005>undergoing<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> may the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2248>you<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> after you have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> a little <S%G3641>while,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2675%G99999><s%> <S%G2675>perfect,<s%> <S%G4741>establish,<s%> <S%G4599>strengthen,<s%> and settle <S%G2311>you.<s%>

<S%G1223>Through<s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus,<s%> our <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> I <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G1223>him,<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3641>briefly,<s%> <S%G3870>exhorting,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1957>testifying<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2476>stand.<s%>

She who is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> chosen together <S%G4899>with<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> so does <S%G3450>Mark,<s%> my <S%G5207>son.<s%>

<S%G782>Greet<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G5370>kiss<s%> of <S%G26>love.<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
